Html:
First of all , thanks for your code.

Can you give me some hint how to print the Ciphertext ? For example, I have an integer that is encoded and then encrypted. How can I see what it looks like after encryption. Can I save it and then loaded back to do further calculation ?

Thanks a lot,

K
Got this done already. Actually there is a build in save load in Ciphertext. Just need to do it in a binary way.
